channel.title: Hamas on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Hamas on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: HBO Max to Air the First Scripted Series Depicting Hamas’ Oct. 7 Attack on Israel
item.description: The limited series ‘One Day in October’ will present a real-time account of the devastating attack, which producers say will be handled with “the utmost care, sensitivity and urgency.”
